title: Mind-Blowing YouTube Growth Strategies With Nick Nimmin
itunes:title: Mind-Blowing YouTube Growth Strategies With Nick Nimmin
description:
If you’re looking to build your brand and business on YouTube, or if you’re currently building on YouTube, then you can’t miss this interview.
 
Nick Nimmin is a YouTube Certified content creator, consultant, and he speaks at top events like VidSummit and Social Media Marketing World.
 
I watched this dude go from 10k subscribers in early 2017 to nearly half a million currently. And I am working with him to grow my YouTube channel. This guy is the real deal.
 
In this interview, Nick gives us a framework to start on YouTube, how to massively grow your views and subscribers, how to monetize fast, and the best tools you need to win on YouTube.
 
Show Notes: https://underdogempowerment.com/nick-nimmin/
 
Get More Involved: 
 
  1. Leave A Review & Subscribe On iTunes: https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/underdog-empowerment/id1373572178
  2. Access Our Top Resource Recommendations: https://underdogempowerment.com/resources/
  3. Join The Elite Underdog Alphas With The Free Underdog Report: https://underdogempowerment.com/report
  4. Subscribe On YouTube: https://underdogempowerment.com/youtube
